title: This Is My Song

tokens.lyric: This is my song, O God of all the nations,

lines.raw: [C]This is my song, O God of all the nations,

tokens.lyric: A song of peace for lands afar and mine.

lines.raw: [Dm]A song of peace for lands afar and mine.

tokens.lyric: This is my home, the country where my heart is;

lines.raw: [G7]This is my home, the country where my heart is;

tokens.lyric: Here are my hopes, my dreams, my holy shrine;

lines.raw: [C]Here are my hopes, my dreams, my holy shrine;

tokens.lyric: But other hearts in other lands are beating

lines.raw: [Am]But other hearts in other lands are beating

tokens.lyric: With hopes and dreams as true and high as mine.

lines.raw: [Em]With hopes and dreams as true and high as mine.

tokens.lyric: My country's skies are bluer than the ocean,

lines.raw: [Dm]My country's skies are bluer than the ocean,

tokens.lyric: And sunlight beams on cloverleaf and pine.

lines.raw: [C]And sunlight beams on cloverleaf and pine.

tokens.lyric: But other lands have sunlight too, and clover,

lines.raw: [G7]But other lands have sunlight too, and clover,

tokens.lyric: And skies are everywhere as blue as mine.

lines.raw: [C]And skies are everywhere as blue as mine.

tokens.lyric: Oh, hear my song, thou God of all the nations,

lines.raw: [C]Oh, hear my song, thou God of all the nations,

tokens.lyric: A song of peace for their land and for mine.

lines.raw: [Dm]A song of peace for their land and for mine.

tokens.lyric: This is my prayer, O Lord of all earth's kingdoms,

lines.raw: [G7]This is my prayer, O Lord of all earth's kingdoms,

tokens.lyric: Thy kingdom come; on earth thy will be done.

lines.raw: [C]Thy kingdom come; on earth thy will be done.

tokens.lyric: Let Christ be lifted up till all men serve him,

lines.raw: [Am]Let Christ be lifted up till all men serve him,

tokens.lyric: And hearts united learn to live as one.

lines.raw: [Em]And hearts united learn to live as one.

tokens.lyric: Oh, hear my prayer, thou God of all the nations,

lines.raw: [Dm]Oh, hear my prayer, thou God of all the nations,

tokens.lyric: Myself I give thee; Let Thy will be done.

lines.raw: [C]Myself I give thee; Let Thy will be done.
